title: Arrow Book of Ghost Stories
description: Edited by Nora KramerIllustrated by George WildeBook includes: The king o' the cats / Joseph Jacobs -- Jimmy takes vanishing lessons / Walter R. Brooks -- The woodman and the goblins / J.B. Esenwein, Marietta Stockard -- The wonderful cat of Cobbie Bean / Barbee Oliver Carleton -- Teeny-tiny / Joseph Jacobs -- The conjure wives Frances G. Wickes -- Spook's bones / Louis C. Jones -- Which was witch? / Eleanore M. Jewett -- The water ghost / John Kendrick Bangs
author: Nora Kramer
